attributes.action: Make all packaging be marked with standard recycling symbols.
attributes.additional_details: It can be difficult to tell what can be recycled and what can not.  For example, most people thought that paper coffee cups could be recycled when they could not - luckily some recycling of these cups is now happening.  But the public is rightly confused about other items, so lets make it easier for everyone by marking packaging.
attributes.background: To increase the amount of recycling and help prevent contamination is simple - just ensure manufacturers mark all packaging with the standard symbols.
